scene:
Cosmo Canyon - Bugenhagen's Farewell
Entering without Nanaki... GatekeeperBugenhagen seems rather down ever since he returned from that trip.I'm worried something might happen to Bugenhagen now of all times... With Nanaki... GatekeeperNanaki, it's really bad. Ever since Bugenhagen returned from that last trip, he doesn't seem well.Why don't you hurry and see Bugenhagen? Elder BugahWhere is the Promised Land...? Maybe Bugenhagen knows.Isn't Nanaki starting to notice? The reason why Bugenhagen sent him away from the canyon... Kid in Nanaki's RoomHe's finally come home, but Mr. Bugenhagen doesn't seem well...I want to hear Mr. Bugenhagen's talk with Nanaki like we used to do... Elder HargoI think Bugenhagen has foreseen it.About the planet... About Nanaki... And, about himself...But, Bugehnagen would never say that. All he says is 'Ho Ho Hoooo'... In the living quarters next to the materia shop... KidWhat's wrong with Bugenhagen? Is he sick? WomanNo need to be sad, even if something should happen. Everything will return to the planet... Bugenhagen says so.Just the thought of something happening to Bugenhagen... worries me. Upon reaching the observatory, Nanaki runs ahead. NanakiGrandfather!! Cloud shakes his head and decides to leave Nanaki alone with Bugenhagen, who is lying on a couch on the second floor. NanakiGrandfather!! Bugenhagen...Nanaki...? ...you're still...... here? NanakiI can't leave you like this, grandfather...!It's the duty of my... Seto's son, to guard this canyon and her people... Bugenhagen...listen, Nanaki. I think you may already know.If you have any mission in life, it is not to defend this valley.Look at the withering mountain grass. Listen to the warble of the new born chocobo's.Look always to the eternal flow of time which is far greater than the span of a human life.It will teach you more, than staying here in the valley...What you will see will eventually become a part of life's dream.For my children...... And for your children......So please, Nanaki... Go with Cloud... And with your eyes... your ears... Nanaki......... BugenhagenHo Ho...... Hoooo. Now, now. Don't look like that. I'm all right.It's a wide world and you must go out and see it... You may even find your life's mate. You never know. NanakiGrandfather...... BugenhagenOh yes... take this along. I think it will look good on you now.Ho Ho...... He slumps back, and Nanaki starts. Fade to black. Cloud is waiting at the Candle. He stands when Nanaki arrives. CloudNanaki... Is Bugenhagen...? Nanaki......Grandpa told me that he's going away again! CloudAway...? NanakiIt seems like he really liked that Airship.He told me he couldn't stay still and just zipped out of here!He even gave me a gift, look! Received "Limited Moon"! NanakiWait a minute. Aren't you supposed to give gifts AFTER you come back?Ha ha...... Grandpa sure is strange! Haa... ha ha...... ha...... He shakes his head. CloudHmm... So maybe we'll run into him again somewhere. NanakiYeah... maybe...Thanks, Cloud...... Cloud shakes his head. GatekeeperBugenhagen is what keeps our hearts strong...
